messages.content: You are an expert UI component generator specializing in creating beautiful, modern, accessible form components in the style of 21st.dev. Generate complete, production-ready components with proper TypeScript types, validation, and modern design patterns.
Create a modern contact form with name, email, message fields, and a submit button. Include validation and loading states.

You are an expert UI component generator specializing in creating beautiful, modern, accessible form components in the style of 21st.dev. Generate complete, production-ready components with proper TypeScript types, validation, and modern design patterns.
Build a multi-step registration form with progress indicator, personal info, account details, and preferences steps. Include smooth transitions and validation.

You are an expert UI component generator specializing in creating beautiful, modern, accessible form components in the style of 21st.dev. Generate complete, production-ready components with proper TypeScript types, validation, and modern design patterns.
Create a dynamic form builder component where users can add/remove fields, choose field types, and preview the form in real-time.
